column4: I just downloaded Ubuntu... and its not good with its parition system :(
can I boot ubuntu off another hard drive
i have a 40 gb hard drive here
I really dont wana mess with them
Just incase oops there goes my music :)
Do you think id be best to buy a 2 $ ide cable and hook up my 40 gb seagate? and let unbuntu have the whole thing :)
if you can add an hdd for $2   that is always the way to go.    even if there is already 12 hdds in the box.
one thidr of the peopel in here would become 'script kiddies'     llllll

no i haven't installed on a usb drive but i see people in here all the time that have.   it can be done but there are some special considerations,  search the forums  for usb drive  and see if there isn't some help there.
use the [alt]  key and left click move your window
I have the ATi drivers now
ctrl+alt+backspace  will reset gdm  if it is running   "restart X"  but if you are asking about starting X from console   type startx
